name: CreateTeamNotificationSubscriptions
description:
Create notification subscriptions for a specified team.

Use this tool to create new notification subscriptions for a given team by specifying the team's ID. Requires appropriate OAuth permissions.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The ID of the team for which you want to create notification subscriptions. This is a required identifier.

parameters.name: api_version_header
parameters.description: Specify the API versioning header using `Accept` to ensure proper versioning of the request.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: entities_to_subscribe
parameters.description: A JSON object containing an array of entities to subscribe to, each with an 'id' and 'type'.

subscribable_id.description: The ID of the entity to subscribe to

subscribable_type.description: The type of the entity being subscribed to

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

subscribable_id.description: The ID of the entity to subscribe to

subscribable_type.description: The type of the entity being subscribed to

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
